backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, vehicle records, notifications, activation tokens, permissions, and invite code generation with multiple authorization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected files, components, and test IDs for two frontend fixes regarding vehicle listing consistency and error handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files including hooks, pages, components, and PWA setup.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration enabling TypeScript, React, and React Hooks rules with custom warning settings and ignore patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier configuration specifying formatting rules such as semicolons, print width, quotes, and tab size.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Change control policy defining protected interfaces, backend API rules, verification steps, and mandatory review requirements.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Project changelog documenting PWA support, recent feature additions, and prior release history following semantic versioning.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script to run frontend quality gates via npm from the CI pipeline.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document configuring metadata, PWA icons, and root mounting point.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull request checklist enforcing change control, quality gates, testing steps, and documentation requirements.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, start URL, icons, and categories.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching strategy, asset caching, and versioned cache cleanup.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation explaining the automated quality gates system and how to run it.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Guide summarizing the project's change-control system for developers.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Documentation describing how semantic versioning is applied within the project.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test file placeholder for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, query client, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/activation/Vehic: UI card for viewing activation status and redeeming vehicle registration activation tokens.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with navigation back to dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Inline error card showing profile load failures with retry and technical details.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Displays the sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with branding, feature highlights, and a login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Renders a detailed startup error screen with backend diagnostics, retry logic, and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Shows the Pasar Digital Community logo with configurable size options.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Empty placeholder component for future language switching UI.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, footer, routing, and backend‑status banner handling.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned, disabling actions when backend connectivity is degraded.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for reporting a found vehicle with validation and backend‑availability gating.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation header with logo, route buttons, user menu, and admin visibility logic.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBa: Shows a dismissible PWA install banner when installable and triggers the native install prompt.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Displays a dismissible backend-connection error banner with retry, status indicators, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Catches unexpected top-level render errors and displays a fallback UI instead of crashing.
Renders a user-facing error screen with guidance and a reload button when a fatal error occurs.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Manages vehicle transfer initiation with PIN entry, backend degradation checks, and transfer code display.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: A PIN entry dialog that blocks submission when backend is degraded and supports confirm/submit handlers.
frontend/src/components/vehicle/VehicleP: Displays a vehicle photo with fallback UI if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap status with classified error handling and auto-retry logic including continuous retries for service-unavailable errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin checks, onboarding eligibility, invite code management, activation token handling, and system stats retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectionS: Combines actor bootstrap and backend health into a single status object for UI availability and retry control.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Runs periodic anonymous health checks against the backend and exposes reachability and diagnostics info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages II authentication state, login, logout, identity loading, and exposes an identity context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Fetches lost vehicles and provides mutations for marking vehicles lost/stolen/pawned or reporting them found with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Fetches the caller’s notifications with polling and offers a mutation to mark notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Handles onboarding completion with detailed logging, error normalization, and post‑success cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Manages PIN existence checks and provides mutations for setting and updating a user PIN.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Fetches and updates the current user's profile using identity‑scoped queries and invalidates profile cache on save.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfer.ts: Provides transfer initiation and acceptance mutations and invalidates related vehicle caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Duplicate transfer hooks that initiate or accept transfers and refresh related vehicle queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Runs a backend vehicle check by engine number via a simple mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleRegistratio: Checks vehicle registration activation status and redeems activation tokens with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, register, and revoke vehicle ownership using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/__tests__/VehiclesPag: Test file placeholder with no content.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an informational page describing the app, its security features, and contact details.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Form page for accepting vehicle transfers with backend availability checks and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard displaying system stats with admin-gating, error handling, and retry support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin page for generating activation tokens tied to a user principal with copy actions and admin-access checks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing vehicle counts, notifications, reported vehicles, and quick action shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Displays and filters a list of lost, stolen, or pawned vehicles with status details and search.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications, allows marking items as read, and shows empty or loading states.
Empty placeholder page with no content.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Handles user onboarding with profile form submission, first-admin detection, and redirects after completion.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits user profile with PIN management and backend availability checks.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides vehicle registration form with activation gating and image upload handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFoundVehiclePag: Lets users search by engine number and report found vehicles based on status.
frontend/src/pages/RevokeOwnershipPage.t: Lists user vehicles and enables ownership revocation with PIN confirmation and error handling.
Page for creating or updating a security PIN, with backend availability checks and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Provides vehicle status lookup by engine number and displays status badges, errors, and report options.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed vehicle info, status, and owner actions including revoke ownership with PIN confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Lists user-owned vehicles with status badges, loading/error states, and an option to register new vehicles.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers and manages the service worker in production, handling updates and controlled reloads.
frontend/src/pwa/usePwaInstallPrompt.ts: React hook that manages the PWA install prompt lifecycle, dismissal logic, and installability state.
frontend/src/routes/__tests__/RootRouteG: Empty test file placeholder for RootRouteGate.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Controls root-level auth and bootstrap flow, routing users to sign-in, onboarding, or app layout based on state.
frontend/src/utils/__tests__/bootstrapEr: Empty test file placeholder for bootstrap error utilities.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Wraps backend actors to safely handle access control initialization and suppress invalid admin token failures.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Generates a consistent React Query key for actor queries using the principal.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Provides a static allowlist of admin principals with helpers to check and list them.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Classifies bootstrap errors, extracts technical details, and avoids false service-unavailable cases using health hints.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeActorError.t: Normalizes actor call errors into user-friendly messages with optional context-specific handling and preserved technical details.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingTroubleshoo: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them—including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the app version and build timestamp constants.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with extended theme colors, typography, container queries, animations, and custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and requested fixes for frontend errors, vehicle workflows, and bootstrap screens.
